21 days

Budget Backpacker Mexico: 3 Weeks

The Classic Route on $40/Day

This is the classic Mexico backpacker route—from the vibrant streets of Mexico City through indigenous highlands to Caribbean beaches. It's doable on $40-50/day if you're smart about it, staying in hostels, eating street food, and taking overnight buses. Three weeks lets you experience Mexico's incredible diversity without rushing.

Trip Highlights

  • World-class museums and street food in Mexico City
  • Oaxacan cuisine, mezcal, and indigenous culture
  • Highland indigenous villages around San Cristóbal
  • Jungle-wrapped Mayan ruins at Palenque
  • Caribbean beaches and cenotes
  • Meet travelers from around the world
Duration
21 days
Best Time
November-April (dry season), shoulder months May and October for fewer crowds
Budget (Mid-Range)
$1,500-2,500 USD

Day-by-Day Itinerary

1

Arrive Mexico City

Land in the world's largest Spanish-speaking city and get oriented.

Today's Activities:
2

Mexico City - Museums & Markets

Hit the free/cheap highlights of the world's museum capital.

Today's Activities:
3

Mexico City - Coyoacán & Xochimilco

Explore bohemian neighborhoods and float on ancient canals.

Today's Activities:
4

Mexico City - Teotihuacán Day Trip

Visit the massive pyramids just outside the city.

Today's Activities:
5

Arrive Oaxaca

Wake up in Mexico's culinary and cultural capital.

Today's Activities:
6

Oaxaca - Monte Albán & Artisan Villages

Ancient ruins in the morning, artisan villages in the afternoon.

Today's Activities:
7

Oaxaca - Free Day & Cooking Class

Relax, explore, or take an optional cooking class.

Today's Activities:
8

Arrive San Cristóbal de las Casas

Welcome to the Chiapas highlands—indigenous culture, cool weather, bohemian vibes.

Today's Activities:
9

San Cristóbal - Indigenous Villages

Visit Tzotzil Maya communities with unique traditions.

Today's Activities:
10

San Cristóbal - Canyons & Free Day

Optional adventure or free day to relax.

Today's Activities:
11

San Cristóbal to Palenque

Descend from highlands to jungle for spectacular Maya ruins.

Today's Activities:
12

Palenque Ruins

Explore one of Maya civilization's most impressive cities.

Today's Activities:
13

Palenque to Tulum

Long travel day to the Caribbean coast.

Today's Activities:
14

Tulum - Beach & Ruins

Caribbean turquoise, clifftop ruins, and cenotes.

Today's Activities:
15

Tulum - Cenotes Deep Dive

Spend the day exploring the cenote systems.

Today's Activities:
16

Tulum to Isla Holbox

Head to a car-free island paradise for your final beach days.

Today's Activities:
17

Isla Holbox - Island Life

Relax into island pace—beaches, wildlife, and slow living.

Today's Activities:
18

Holbox - Free Day

Another day in paradise. Whale sharks if in season.

Today's Activities:
19

Holbox to Cancún

Return to the mainland for your last nights.

Today's Activities:
20

Cancún - Optional Day Trips

Last full day. Day trip or relax before departure.

Today's Activities:
21

Departure

Fly home from Cancún International Airport.

Today's Activities:

Practical Information

Getting There

Fly into Mexico City (MEX), fly out of Cancún (CUN). Open-jaw flights are often similar price to round-trip.

Getting Around

ADO first-class buses for long hauls, colectivos for short trips, occasional short flights if budget allows.
